error.no_results_found: No results found.  Try searching for a different area with the same schedule as yours or choose a different provider.
error.provider_error: Unable to reach Provider.  See Logs for details.

lookup_areas.description: Search your area name, e.g. Milnerton, then select your area ID from the results.

sepush.description:
Request an [Eskom Se Push API Key](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeZhAkhDaQX_mLT2xn41TkVjLkOH3Py3YWHi_UqQP4niOY01g/viewform)  
Select '< 50' requests and 'data serialization' for the Test.
